channel.title: I need lag help
channel.description: plz tell me what to do

item.title: I need lag help
item.dc:creator: @werefaw1 werefaw1
item.description:
@werefaw1 wrote:

[quote=“dragster32, post:6, topic:105676”][quote author=werefaw1 link=topic=151383.msg1430148#msg1430148 date=1180944888]
the main causes of lagging are:
~ slow computers, so the server is running slow
~ to many players on your server, but your computer has low space on it
~ to many items, npcs, ect…
~ doing other stuff on your computer while running the server cause your computer to run slow, causing the players to lag
[/quote]

to fix some of these

  1. get a new computer
  2. set limit to players on your computer
  3. delete some of the npcs, items,
  4. dont be watching porn while running server. Shut the server down temporarily or use another computer :|. lawl.[/quote]
    i basicly already said all of that

Read full topic

item.title: I need lag help
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

[quote=“werefaw1, post:5, topic:105676”]the main causes of lagging are:
~ slow computers, so the server is running slow
~ to many players on your server, but your computer has low space on it
~ to many items, npcs, ect…
~ doing other stuff on your computer while running the server cause your computer to run slow, causing the players to lag[/quote]

to fix some of these

  1. get a new computer
  2. set limit to players on your computer
  3. delete some of the npcs, items,
  4. dont be watching porn while running server. Shut the server down temporarily or use another computer :|. lawl.

Read full topic

item.title: I need lag help
item.dc:creator: @werefaw1 werefaw1
item.description:
@werefaw1 wrote:

hes saying his server lags

the main causes of lagging are:
~ slow computers, so the server is running slow
~ to many players on your server, but your computer has low space on it
~ to many items, npcs, ect…
~ doing other stuff on your computer while running the server cause your computer to run slow, causing the players to lag

the best way to reduce lag to none or almost none is to get a server box, or use a separate computer with nothing much on it so it can use more space, but i doupt u want to spend money on running a server
so just reduce the max players, npcs, and dont multi-task while running it

Read full topic
